post:
Hello Together,

Within the next few weeks our project "Serverlux" will start. Until then you have the chance to receive a free webhosting bundle - for lifetime. After its release, Serverlux will continuously provide you with high-quality services in the areas vserver, webhosting, domains, ssl. Our experienced team will support you in our forums from release on.


The complete infrastructure is based on high-quality hardware by Supermicro and is located within the Accelerated data center in Frankfurt at Main. All systems use Raid10 and are backed up daily. Management can be done easily via the cPanel web interface.

Hosting Starter Free

- 8GB Storage,
-  8 MySQL Databases
-  8  FTP Accounts
-  8 IMAP/Mail Accounts

also:

-  unlimited bandwith
-  unlimited Addon Domains
-  free Subdomain (freelux.me,s3rv.me,serverlux.me)
-  CPanel Webinterface
 

and many more !


You will find our Prepage at: http://serverlux.net
